text: Marco Antonio Vilca Gonzales (born 2 December 2000) is a Peruvian middle- distance runner specialising in the 800 metres. He has won several medals at continental level. His twin sister Sheyla Vilca is also a runner. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2016 |South American U18 Championships |Concordia, Argentina |bgcolor=silver|2nd |800 m |1:58.37 |- |rowspan=2|2017 |World U18 Championships |Nairobi, Kenya |9th (h) |800 m |1:51.95 |- |Pan American U20 Championships |Trujillo, Peru |5th |800 m |1:53.00 |- |rowspan=7|2018 |rowspan=2|South American Games |rowspan=2|Cochabamba, Bolivia |8th |400 m |48.04 |- |4th |800 m |1:52.03 |- |World U20 Championships |Tampere, Finland |21st (h) |800 m |1:50.47 |- |rowspan=2|Ibero-American Championships |rowspan=2|Trujillo, Peru |4th |800 m |1:49.82 |- |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |4 × 400 m relay |3:15.59 |- |rowspan=2|South American U23 Championships |rowspan=2|Cuenca, Ecuador |bgcolor=silver|2nd |800 m |1:50.52 |- |5th |4 × 100 m relay |42.52 |- |rowspan=5|2019 |South American Championships |Lima, Peru |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |800 m |1:48.06 |- |rowspan=2|South American U20 Championships |rowspan=2|Cali, Colombia |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |400 m |47.41 |- |bgcolor=gold|1st |800 m |1:48.86 |- |Pan American U20 Championships |San José, Costa Rica |9th (h) |800 m |1:52.63 |- |Pan American Games |Lima, Peru |5th |800 m |1:47.65 |- |rowspan=2|2020 |rowspan=2|South American Indoor Championships |rowspan=2|Cochabamba, Bolivia |bgcolor=silver|2nd |400 m |47.84 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |800 m |1:54.11 |} ==Personal bests== Outdoor *400 metres – 46.95 (Trujillo 2019) *800 metres – 1:47.65 (Lima 2019) ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Peruvian male middle-distance runners Category:Pan American Games competitors for Peru Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:People from Arequipa Category:Twin sportspeople Category:Twin people from Peru
title: Marco Vilca
